page.title: 17Draycott Sports Centre
page.content: Draycott Sports Centre is a very well equiped centre which has quite a lot of members. There are four sports which you can play. They are tennis, table tennis, squash and badminton. There are 6 tennis courts, 1 table tennis table, 1 badminton court and 6 squash courts. Other facilities include toilets, showers, changing rooms, television and vending machines. There is a licensed bar where you can obtain bar snacks. Some people only have house membership, so they can only attend the social functions or use the bar. Children have a special junior membershipp allowing them to play all four sports. Adult members can join as a full member or just for an individual sport. Quite often coaching takes place for junior members. Also, tournaments are held for senior and junior members.
